column4: I have a 400GB HD that's failing.  I want to copy the contents over to a 500GB HD so it's a duplicate.  Can I use dd even though the sizes are not the same?
yes, if you don't mind wasting the surplus space. you'll have an exact copy of the filesystem (as opposed to partition)
if I don't want to waste the space, will cp (making sure all permissions stay the same) work?
